general.something_wrong: Something didn't work quite right, but don't worry - your important information is safe.
general.try_again: Let me try that again for you
general.contact_support: I'm here to help if you need assistance
general.no_data_lost: The good news is that nothing you've worked on has been lost
general.temporary_issue: This seems to be a temporary issue that should resolve quickly

network.connection_lost: It looks like your internet connection got interrupted. Your work is saved, and we'll reconnect automatically.
network.slow_connection: Your connection seems a bit slow today. I'll wait patiently while things load.
network.server_busy: Our servers are a bit busy right now, but I'll keep trying to help you.
network.timeout: That took longer than expected. Let me try a different approach.

validation.required_field: Your family will need this information - could you help me fill this in?
validation.invalid_email: That email address doesn't look quite right. Could you double-check it for me?
validation.invalid_phone: I'm having trouble with that phone number format. Could you try entering it differently?
validation.invalid_date: That date format isn't working for me. Could you try MM/DD/YYYY?
validation.password_weak: Let's make your password a bit stronger to keep your family's information extra safe.
validation.file_too_large: That file is a bit too large for me to handle. Could you try a smaller version?
validation.unsupported_file: I can't work with that type of file. Could you try a PDF or image instead?

assets.save_failed: I couldn't save that asset information right now, but I'll keep trying. Your family's information is important to me.
assets.load_failed: I'm having trouble loading your assets right now. Let me try again in a moment.
assets.delete_failed: I couldn't remove that item just now. Would you like me to try again?

documents.upload_failed: That document didn't upload properly. Don't worry - I'll help you try again.
documents.processing_failed: I had trouble processing that document. The file is safe, and I'll try again.
documents.access_failed: I can't access that document right now. Let me see what I can do to help.

family.save_failed: I couldn't save that person's information just now. Let me try again - your trusted circle is important.
family.invite_failed: I couldn't send that invitation right now. I'll help you try again when you're ready.
family.access_failed: I'm having trouble with the family access settings. Let me work on this for you.

will.generation_failed: I couldn't create your will just now. Don't worry - all your decisions are saved, and I'll try again.
will.save_failed: I couldn't save those will changes right now. Your previous version is safe, and I'll keep trying.
will.legal_check_failed: I couldn't verify the legal requirements just now. Let me try again, or we can get help from our legal team.

emotional_support.frustration: I know this is frustrating when you're trying to do something important for your family. I'm here to help make this work.
emotional_support.time_pressure: I understand you don't have a lot of time for technical problems. Let me handle this quickly for you.
emotional_support.overwhelm: Technical issues can feel overwhelming when you're already dealing with important family planning. Take a breath - I've got this.
emotional_support.discouragement: Don't let this technical hiccup discourage you. What you're doing for your family is too important to give up on.

solutions.refresh_page: Sometimes refreshing the page helps. Your work is saved, so you won't lose anything.
solutions.try_different_browser: If this keeps happening, try using a different browser. Chrome or Firefox usually work best.
solutions.check_internet: Could you check your internet connection? Sometimes that's all it takes.
solutions.contact_support: I'd love to help you personally. You can reach our support team who will take great care of you.
solutions.try_later: If you're in a hurry, you could try this again later. Everything you've done is safely saved.
solutions.alternative_approach: Let me suggest a different way to do this that might work better.

recovery.auto_save_worked: The good news is that everything you entered was automatically saved.
recovery.backup_available: I have a backup of your work from a few minutes ago if you need it.
recovery.progress_preserved: All your progress is preserved - you won't have to start over.
recovery.data_secure: Your family's information remains completely secure despite this technical issue.
